name: Weighted
description:
Use a set of Weighted Die to cheat in a simple game of Dice.

NOTE: this is the first time I've done anything like this... for some reason, the game was working perfectly fine in the unity editor but after exporting, the game no longer checks win-lose conditions, suspicion never goes up, and after the dice are rolled the game just stalls... any tips and suggestions left in the comments are highly appreciated.

Submitted for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.
